1.caption_en:
Infographic compares a "World before Platforms" with a "World with Platforms", showing digital platforms moving to the center around consumers while traditional companies are pushed to the periphery. It highlights increased pressure on incumbent firms, specifically losing contact with consumers and shrinking margins for product- and asset-heavy companies.

  "artifact_type": "infographic",

5.caption_en:
A radial consumer-centric infographic showing sectors (Living, Mobility, Health, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment) arranged around a central "Consumer" node, with company logos positioned in sector rings. Logos include brands such as Sony, Intel, SAP, DHL, DB, TUI, Microsoft, Zara, Stanford University, Nokia, T‑Mobile, Vonovia, e.on, Knorr-Bremse, Fresenius Medical Care, and Bertelsmann Stiftung.
